response.original_title: The Original Comedians Live - A Celebrity Evening With...
response.overview: A Celebrity Evening with the Original Comedians features the original members of the iconic hit TV Show The Comedians. Featuring live stand-up performances from Roy Walker, Stan Boardman, Mick Miller, Duggie Brown, and including the hilarious Jim Bowen being interviewed by legendary producer Johnnie Hamp.
response.tagline: Some of the original stars of hit ITV comedy series The Comedians return to the stage for a special evening's entertainment.
response.title: The Original Comedians Live - A Celebrity Evening With...
